description:
Nadeko spent the evening at the Araragi residence after Koyomi mistakes her for running away from home and takes her back to his place. The next morning, she talks to Koyomi`s younger sister Tsukihi, a friend from back in grade school, about how she is worried that other people say she is “cute.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 囮物語 なでこメドゥーサ 其ノ參
